data.name: EmployeeDataCannotBeNull
data.comment: Error message displayed when employee data is null during creation or update

data.name: DepartmentDataCannotBeNull
data.comment: Error message displayed when department data is null during creation or update

data.name: SalaryUpdateValidationFailed
data.comment: Error message displayed when salary update validation fails

data.name: DepartmentNameRequired
data.value: Department name is required and must not exceed 100 characters
data.comment: Validation message for department name requirements

data.name: DepartmentNamePatternInvalid
data.value: Department name can only contain letters, spaces, and hyphens
data.comment: Validation message for department name pattern

data.name: CompanyIdRequired
data.value: Company ID must be greater than 0
data.comment: Validation message for company ID requirement

data.name: FullNameRequired
data.value: Full name is required and must not exceed 200 characters
data.comment: Validation message for employee full name requirements

data.name: BirthDateInvalid
data.value: Birth date must be in the past and cannot be more than 100 years ago
data.comment: Validation message for birth date requirements

data.name: HireDateInvalid
data.value: Hire date cannot be in the future
data.comment: Validation message for hire date requirements

data.name: SalaryInvalid
data.value: Salary must be greater than 0 and cannot exceed 1,000,000

data.name: DepartmentIdRequired
data.value: Department ID must be greater than 0
data.comment: Validation message for department ID requirement

data.name: NewSalaryInvalid
data.value: New salary must be greater than 0 and cannot exceed 1,000,000
data.comment: Validation message for new salary requirements

data.name: MaximumCurrentSalaryInvalid
data.value: Maximum current salary must be greater than 0 and cannot exceed 1,000,000
data.comment: Validation message for maximum current salary requirements

data.name: NewSalaryMustBeHigher
data.value: New salary should be higher than the maximum current salary threshold to avoid salary reductions
data.comment: Validation message for salary update logic requirement
